Reference

Package top-level documentation

adoptr

Adaptive Optimal Two-Stage Designs

Location parameter prior classes

Classes and methods for formulating prior assumptions about the location parameter to be tested.

bounds() expectation() condition() predictive_pdf() predictive_cdf() posterior()

Abstract univariate prior on model parameter

PointMassPrior() bounds(<PointMassPrior>) expectation(<PointMassPrior>,<function>) condition(<PointMassPrior>,<numeric>) predictive_pdf(<DataDistribution>,<PointMassPrior>,<numeric>) predictive_cdf(<DataDistribution>,<PointMassPrior>,<numeric>) posterior(<DataDistribution>,<PointMassPrior>,<numeric>)

Point-mass prior

ContinuousPrior() bounds(<ContinuousPrior>) expectation(<ContinuousPrior>,<function>) condition(<ContinuousPrior>,<numeric>) predictive_pdf(<DataDistribution>,<ContinuousPrior>,<numeric>) predictive_cdf(<DataDistribution>,<ContinuousPrior>,<numeric>) posterior(<DataDistribution>,<ContinuousPrior>,<numeric>)

Continuous univariate prior distribution

Data distribution classes

Classes and methods for defining the distribution of observed data (in terms of a sufficient statistic) given a location parameter and sample size.

quantile(<DataDistribution>) probability_density_function() cumulative_distribution_function() simulate(<DataDistribution>,<numeric>)

Data distributions

Normal() probability_density_function(<Normal>,<numeric>,<numeric>,<numeric>) cumulative_distribution_function(<Normal>,<numeric>,<numeric>,<numeric>) quantile(<Normal>) simulate(<Normal>,<numeric>)

Normal data distribution

Conditional- and unconditional score classes

Abstract interface for defining conditional and unconditional scores.

evaluate() integrate()

Working with scores

evaluate(<UnconditionalScore>,<TwoStageDesign>)

Abstract class for unconditional scoring function

evaluate(<ConditionalScore>,<TwoStageDesign>) integrate(<ConditionalScore>)

Class for conditional scoring function

evaluate(<IntegralScore>,<TwoStageDesign>)

Unconditional score class obtained by integration of a ConditionalScore

`+`(<ConditionalScore>,<numeric>) `+`(<numeric>,<ConditionalScore>) `+`(<ConditionalScore>,<ConditionalScore>) `*`(<ConditionalScore>,<numeric>) `*`(<numeric>,<ConditionalScore>) `+`(<UnconditionalScore>,<numeric>) `+`(<numeric>,<UnconditionalScore>) `+`(<UnconditionalScore>,<UnconditionalScore>) `*`(<UnconditionalScore>,<numeric>) `*`(<numeric>,<UnconditionalScore>) `+`(<AffineUnconditionalScore>,<UnconditionalScore>) `+`(<UnconditionalScore>,<AffineUnconditionalScore>) `+`(<AffineUnconditionalScore>,<numeric>) `+`(<numeric>,<AffineUnconditionalScore>) `+`(<AffineUnconditionalScore>,<AffineUnconditionalScore>) `*`(<AffineUnconditionalScore>,<numeric>) `*`(<numeric>,<AffineUnconditionalScore>) `+`(<AffineConditionalScore>,<ConditionalScore>) `+`(<ConditionalScore>,<AffineConditionalScore>) `+`(<AffineConditionalScore>,<numeric>) `+`(<numeric>,<AffineConditionalScore>) `+`(<AffineConditionalScore>,<AffineConditionalScore>) `*`(<AffineConditionalScore>,<numeric>) `*`(<numeric>,<AffineConditionalScore>)

Score arithmetic

Pre-implemented scores

A collection of commonly used pre-implemented scores.

SmoothnessN2() evaluate(<SmoothnessN2>,<TwoStageDesign>)

Quadratic smoothness penalty term

AverageN2() evaluate(<AverageN2>,<TwoStageDesign>)

Regularization via L1 norm

ConditionalPower() evaluate(<ConditionalPower>,<TwoStageDesign>)

Conditional power of a design given stage-one outcome

ConditionalSampleSize() evaluate(<ConditionalSampleSize>,<TwoStageDesign>)

Conditional sample size of a design given stage-one outcome

Design classes and methods

Although the foucus of the package lies on generic two-stage designs, it also supports group-sequential designs and single-stage designs

TwoStageDesign() tunable_parameters() make_tunable() make_fixed() update(<TwoStageDesign>) n2() n() c2() scaled_integration_pivots() plot(<TwoStageDesign>) simulate(<TwoStageDesign>,<numeric>)

Two-stage designs

GSDesign() n2(<GSDesign>,<numeric>) TwoStageDesign(<GSDesign>) evaluate(<SmoothnessN2>,<GSDesign>)

Group-sequential design

OneStageDesign() tunable_parameters(<OneStageDesign>) update(<OneStageDesign>) n2(<OneStageDesign>,<numeric>) c2(<OneStageDesign>,<numeric>) TwoStageDesign(<OneStageDesign>) evaluate(<SmoothnessN2>,<OneStageDesign>)

One-stage design

gq_design()

Design with Gaussian quadrature integration rule

show(<TwoStageDesign>)

Show method for TwoStageDesign objects

summary(<TwoStageDesign>)

Summarize TwoStageDesign objects with optional set of scores

print(<TwoStageDesignSummary>)

Print object of class TwoStageDesignSummary

minimize()

Find optimal two-stage design by constraint minimization

Optimization constraints

Formulation of optimization constraints based on scores.

evaluate(<Constraint>,<TwoStageDesign>) `<=`(<AbstractConditionalScore>,<numeric>) `>=`(<AbstractConditionalScore>,<numeric>) `<=`(<numeric>,<AbstractConditionalScore>) `>=`(<numeric>,<AbstractConditionalScore>) `<=`(<AbstractConditionalScore>,<AbstractConditionalScore>) `>=`(<AbstractConditionalScore>,<AbstractConditionalScore>) `<=`(<UnconditionalScore>,<numeric>) `>=`(<UnconditionalScore>,<numeric>) `<=`(<numeric>,<UnconditionalScore>) `>=`(<numeric>,<UnconditionalScore>) `<=`(<UnconditionalScore>,<UnconditionalScore>) `>=`(<UnconditionalScore>,<UnconditionalScore>)

Formulating constraints

evaluate(<ConstraintsCollection>,<TwoStageDesign>) subject_to()

Collection of constraints
